name: Chocolate Chunk Berry Brownies
author: So Delicious® Dairy Free
summary: This decadent gluten-free brownie recipe can be used with any frozen berries you have on hand.
ingredients: ½ cup gluten-free all purpose baking flour
1 cup So Delicious® Dairy Free Vanilla Coconut Milk
2 ounces dark chocolate, chopped into small chunks
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and line a 9 x 9 inch baking pan with parchment paper
In a large bowl, whisk together the dry ingredients
Add egg substitute, Vanilla Coconutmilk and melted coconut oil
Gently fold the chocolate and berries into the batter
Pour batter into the pan and bake for 30 to 40 minutes or until a knife comes out clean
Sprinkle with powdered sugar, if desired
